title: Whereas by proclamation, dated the eighteenth of May, one thousand six hundred seventy four, we did for the reasons therein expressed, amongst other things therein set forth, inhibit the transportation of several sorts of corn and grain mentioned in the said proclamation ... by the Lord lieutenant and Council, Essex.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1672-1677 : Essex)
publisher: Printed by Benjamin Tooke ... and are to be sold by Joseph Wilde ...,
